sentences.en: A steady look of hers had of late perplexed the man.
sentences.cn: 她近来的呆滞神色使他困惑.

sentences.en: Aunt Polly paused, perplexed, and Tom looked for healing pity.
sentences.cn: 波莉姨妈住了手,愣了一会儿, 汤姆指望她会讲些好话哄他.

sentences.en: Bizarre thoughts, weird visions, and strange voices perplexed and terrified her.
sentences.cn: 数不尽的离奇念头, 光怪陆离的幻象, 奇异的声响,一齐向她袭来,使她感到恐惧.

sentences.en: He is sorely perplexed to account for the situation.
sentences.cn: 要说明那种情况使他感到很为难.

sentences.en: He perplexed me with this problem.
sentences.cn: 他用这个问题难住了我.

sentences.en: He was still more perplexed, for this inconsequent smile made nothing clear.
sentences.cn: 他依然更加感到困惑, 因为这突如其来的一笑,使他感到莫名其妙.

sentences.en: He wasn't irritable or snappy or anything, just slightly perplexed.
sentences.cn: 他并不是爱发火或爱起急什么的，他只是有点困惑。

sentences.en: I am perplexed to know what to do.
Peasants looked over the cows, went away, and came back, perplexed.
sentences.cn: 庄稼汉们审视着母牛, 走开了又回来, 不知道怎样才好.

sentences.en: Perplexed investors tried to work out what the deal meant.
sentences.cn: 投资者感到困惑，试图搞清这个协议意味着什么。

sentences.en: The child was perplexed by the intricate plot of the story.
sentences.cn: 这孩子被那头绪纷繁的故事弄得迷惑不解.

sentences.en: The farmer felt the cow, went away, returned, sorely perplexed, always afraid of being cheated.
sentences.cn: 那农民摸摸那头牛, 走了又回来, 犹豫不决, 总怕上当受骗.

sentences.en: The professor is never at a nonplus, and never perplexed by a problem.
sentences.cn: 那位教授从来不会感到困惑,也不会被任何问题所难倒.

sentences.en: The student looked at him, perplexed.
sentences.cn: 那个学生看着他，一脸的茫然。

sentences.en: They were perplexed by her response.
sentences.cn: 她的答复令他们困惑不解。

sentences.en: We were perplexed at her interest in legal matters.
sentences.cn: 我们对她在法律问题上的兴趣感到迷惑不解.

words.tran_cn: 复杂的，令人费解的；令人困惑的
使困惑，使为难；使复杂化

trans.tran_cn: 困惑的，糊涂的，复杂的，杂乱的
trans.tran_en: confused and worried by something that you do not understand

trans.tran_cn: 使迷惑，使混乱( perplex的过去式和过去分词)，使复杂化，使难办
